citeinfo.origin: Jane Austin, Northern Prairie Wildlife Research Center
citeinfo.title: Bibliography for Northern Pintails (Anas acuta)

pubinfo.publish: U.S. Geological Survey, Northern Prairie Wildlife Research Center

citeinfo.othercit: Northern Prairie Wildlife Research Center Home Page

descript.abstract: The bibliography provides 1,975 citations pertinent to Northern Pintails (Anas acuta). The bibliography covers a wide variety of sources, including some unpublished and "gray" literature. Citations included range from scientific articles specific to pintails to fauna guides and other general sources. Key words (in italics) follow each citation to allow more specific information on each citation and more thorough searches for information of interest.
descript.purpose: The purpose of the bibliography is to provide information on Northern Pintails.

spdom.descgeog: World: North America, United States, Alaska, Canada, Newfoundland, Middle East, North Africa, United Kingdom

attracc.attraccr: Those citations that have been checked for accuracy against the original are preceded by an asterisk.

dataqual.complete: The bibliography provides 1,975 citations pertinent to Northern Pintails.

procstep.procdesc: The author is interested in updating this bibliography. Additional references or corrections to current listings can be sent to Dr. Austin.

distinfo.distliab: Although these data have been processed successfully on a computer system at the U.S. Geological Survey, no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the accuracy or utility of the data on any other system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty. This disclaimer applies both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data. It is strongly recommended that these data are directly acquired from a U.S. Geological Survey server, and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. It is also strongly recommended that careful attention be paid to the contents of the metadata file associated with these data. The U.S. Geological Survey shall not be held liable for improper or incorrect use of the data described and/or contained herein.
